titleStmt.title: Pope Ioane A dialogue betvveene a protestant and a papist. Manifestly prouing, that a woman called Ioane was Pope of Rome: against the surmises and obiections made to the contrarie, by Robert Bellarmine and Cæsar Baronius Cardinals: Florimondus Ræmondus, N.D. and other popish writers, impudently denying the same. By Alexander Cooke.
titleStmt.author: Cooke, Alexander, 1564-1532.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by R. Field] for Ed. Blunt and W. Barret,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
